channel.title: [317 Deob] Adding real whip attack? [still need help!]
channel.description: I am working off a 317 deob and want to change the current whip attack to the real whip attack (like the 508 attack) I like the current whip run, and walk, just dont like the blocky attack. I know I have to change something in the codes but I don't know what? is it client sided client class? and I also need a whip.dat

item.title: [317 Deob] Adding real whip attack? [still need help!]

item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

mind giving me them? i need the new whip attack,anims and what to change in client class…
